statements: SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT review_id, review_text, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, rating FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY rating ASC, review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT review_id, customer_id, product_id, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE product_id = '98765432-1234-5678-90ab-cdef01234567';
SELECT review_id, review_text, review_date FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY review_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT review_id, customer_id, product_id, review_text, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_date > '2022-01-01' AND rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY rating ASC, review_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT review_id, review_text, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_id, average_rating, total_reviews FROM product_ratings WHERE average_rating > 4.5;
SELECT review_id, review_text, rating, review_date FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, average_rating, total_reviews, last_review_date FROM product_ratings ORDER BY last_review_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_id, average_rating FROM product_ratings WHERE total_reviews >= 100 ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_text LIKE '%great%' AND rating >= 3 ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, count(review_id) AS num_reviews FROM customer_reviews GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_reviews > 3 ORDER BY num_reviews DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 'c5d2757a-67c9-4d9f-8bfe-8d0d32a8e328';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, average_rating, total_reviews FROM products WHERE average_rating > 4.5;
SELECT review_id, review_text, rating, review_date FROM reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name, average_rating FROM products WHERE total_reviews >= 100 ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating, review_date FROM reviews WHERE rating > 3 AND review_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY review_date DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, products.product_name, reviews.rating FROM customers JOIN reviews ON customers.customer_id = reviews.customer_id JOIN products ON products.product_id = reviews.product_id WHERE reviews.rating < 4 ORDER BY customers.customer_name ASC, products.product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM reviews;
SELECT product_id, review_text, rating FROM reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT product_id, AVG(rating_value) AS average_rating FROM ratings GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, avg_rating FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price < 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, avg_rating FROM products WHERE category = 'Home' ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM reviews WHERE customer_id = 2 AND rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, timestamp FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating, timestamp FROM reviews WHERE rating > 4;

SELECT customer_name, email, product_name, category, rating FROM customers INNER JOIN reviews ON customers.customer_id = reviews.customer_id INNER JOIN products ON reviews.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedbacks > 1;
